group_1.textRight: 80 grams of sugar... @Well, this oughta be enough.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:300701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock] W-wait, Ryou...!

group_1.textRight: Mm?

group_1.textLeft: For sweets...if you get the wrong amount, @they end up bad...

group_1.textRight: Oh, is that right?

Ryou, this is 120 grams!@[chara:305301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:305301:cheek_0][chara:305301:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:305301:motion_200][chara:305301:lipSynch_1]You're being sloppy...! Totally!

group_1.textLeft: If you don't make the sweets according to the recipe, @they're probably not going to turn out well...

group_1.textRight: Is that so?
Usually when Ryou's cooking, everything just gets @thrown in.

group_1.textLeft: I'm more impressed than anything that you manage @like that...

group_1.textRight: That's just like Ryou, though.
That was a good lesson. @Thanks, Shizuku.

group_1.textLeft: N-no...

group_1.textRight: ...What happened?

group_1.textLeft: S-sorry! @Some of the flour went all over the place...
...G-geez~, Kumi is so clumsyyy~

group_1.textRight: Ahh, I see.
So you're testin' out a clumsy character this time, @huh?

group_1.textLeft: It's not a characterrr~
Kumi's huffin' puffin' mad!

group_1.textRight: Ah, there's flour under you, so don't start flailin' or @you'll fall...

group_1.textLeft: Kya!?[chara:305301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock][chara:305301:effect_shake]

group_1.textRight: Don't say ya weren't warned.

group_1.textLeft: Eee~n, Kumi's in pain and can't get uuup~
...Come on, start taking this seriously or we'll never @finish.
Follow Sakurako's example.

group_1.textRight: Huh, but isn't Sakurako stuck?
Sakurako...?

group_1.textLeft: | Shizuku, there is something I don't understand. |
| It is written that I am to let the dough settle, |
| but is the dough not calm right now? |
| What must I do to calm the dough down? |

group_1.textRight: Ahh...um, that means to leave the dough out for @a little.

group_1.textLeft: | But if the dough is panicking, @is it okay to just leave it alone? |

group_1.textRight: Umm, when it says to let it settle, @it doesn't mean it like that...

group_1.textLeft: | Was the information Nemu provided me @incorrect? |

group_1.textRight: It's not like that...
...Ikumi, how would you explain this...?
Ehh~! @Passed to Kumiii?
Hey, what're you doing, Ryou!?
Don't just take pictures, help us out~
Mm, Sakurako really doesn't seem to be grasping @the concept here...

group_1.textLeft: | If Hinano was here, |
| I might have access to chloroform. |

group_1.textRight: ...That'll do more than just calm it down...
Who taught Sakurako about such a dangerous @thing!?

group_1.textLeft: | I saw it in a drama. |

group_1.textRight: If you mixed chloroform in with the sweets,
we'd be all over the papers.

group_1.textLeft: | Then, what am I supposed to do...? |

group_1.textRight: When humans want to calm down, we take deep @breaths.

group_1.textLeft: | ...! |[chara:304301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]
| ...Nemu would drink coffee when she was settling @down... |

group_1.textRight: Your face says "I get it now," but that's not it at all.
Is this how it usually goes when you help Yachiyo @with cooking?

group_1.textLeft: | No, any time I was about to make a mistake, @Yachiyo would tell me. |

group_1.textRight: So you can do what you're told, but you can't handle @following a recipe...

group_1.textLeft: Th-then... @Let's split up the roles!

group_1.textRight: [chara:305301:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Finished~♪

group_1.textLeft: All thanks to Shizuku's direction.

group_1.textRight: | Yes, unlike Ryou, I am capable of making accurate @measurements. |

group_1.textLeft: And Ryou got to be in charge of covering Sakurako's weak points.

group_1.textRight: And Kumi got to put on the cutesy finishing @touches♪

group_1.textLeft: ...Making sweets is harder than I thought...

group_1.textRight: | But Shizuku, you were having fun. |
| You were smiling the entire time we were @working. |

group_1.textLeft: (That's right...I was having fun.)
(I didn't notice because I was so busy. @That it's very...)
...Yeah, it was fun.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, Kumi also had lots of fun!

group_1.textLeft: Making sweets isn't so bad after all.
By the way, who is everyone giving their chocolate @to?

group_1.textRight: | ...I must give it to someone? |

group_1.textLeft: That's because it's Valentine's.

group_1.textRight: | ...Because it's Valentine's, you give it? |

group_1.textLeft: Eh?
Mm... What are you asking?

group_1.textRight: | I do not understand. |
| Why do you give chocolates on Valentine's Day? |
